rows: Whether to set the button width automatically.

Distance between the letters in button caption.

html:
Parameter

Functionality

Auto width

Whether to set the button width automatically.

Width

Width of the button relative to the fields.

Text color

Color of the button caption.

Background color

Color of the button.

Letter spacing

Distance between the letters in button caption.

Font style

Whether to make button caption bold or italic.

Content padding

Distance between the caption and button border.

Padding

Distance between the button border and fields.

Border

Whether the button has an outline.

Border radius

Whether to round button corners.
